documents.no_documents: No documents available for this case

portal_sessions.no_upcoming_description: You don't have any scheduled sessions at the moment.

portal_documents.upload_description: Upload any required documents or supporting materials for your cases

portal_documents.upload_success_description: Your documents have been uploaded successfully

form.title: Request Title

portal_requests.locked_message: This request is under review and cannot be edited
portal_requests.create_success_description: Your request has been submitted successfully

portal_notifications.title: Notifications
portal_notifications.subtitle: Stay updated on your cases and requests
portal_notifications.mark_read_error: Failed to mark notification as read
portal_notifications.mark_all_read_error: Failed to mark all notifications as read

empty.unread_message: You have no unread notifications at the moment
empty.all_message: You'll receive notifications about your cases, sessions, and documents here

info.title: About Notifications
info.message: Click on any notification to view details and mark it as read. You'll receive notifications about case updates, session reminders, document requests, and replies from your lawyer.

portal_calendar.title: Calendar
portal_calendar.subtitle: View all your sessions, tasks, and milestones
portal_calendar.no_date_selected: Select a date to view events
portal_calendar.no_events_description: There are no scheduled sessions, tasks, or milestones on this date

info.title: About Calendar
info.message: This calendar aggregates all your scheduled sessions, task due dates, and important milestones. Click on any date to view details. This is a read-only view - to make changes, please visit the specific section (Sessions, Tasks, or Requests).

portal_profile.title: My Profile
portal_profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and settings
portal_profile.legal_identity_description: These fields cannot be changed. Contact support if corrections are needed.
portal_profile.legal_identity_notice: Your legal name and ID number cannot be changed for security reasons. If you need to update these details, please contact our support team.
portal_profile.contact_info_description: You can update your contact details below
portal_profile.change_password_description: Update your account password for security
portal_profile.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long
portal_profile.update_success_message: Your profile has been updated successfully
portal_profile.password_success_message: Your password has been changed successfully
portal_profile.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long

portal_support.title: Support & Help
portal_support.subtitle: Get help with your case or ask questions about our services
portal_support.form_description: Fill out the form below and our team will respond as soon as possible
portal_support.success_message: Your support request has been submitted successfully. Our team will review it and respond within 1-2 business days.
portal_support.next_step_1: Your request has been sent to our support team
portal_support.next_step_2: We'll review your message and respond within 1-2 business days
portal_support.next_step_3: You'll receive a notification when we respond
portal_support.message_placeholder: Please provide details about your inquiry or issue...
portal_support.privacy_notice: Your information will be handled confidentially and only used to respond to your inquiry.
portal_support.validation_error_message: Please fill in all required fields
portal_support.submit_success_message: Your support request has been submitted successfully
portal_support.contact_info_description: You can also reach us through these channels
portal_support.faq_1_q: How long does it take to get a response?
portal_support.faq_1_a: We typically respond within 1-2 business days
portal_support.faq_2_q: Can I track my support request?
portal_support.faq_2_a: You'll receive notifications when we respond to your request
portal_support.faq_3_q: What if I have an urgent issue?
portal_support.faq_3_a: For urgent matters, please call us directly during business hours
